description:
This tutorial is designed for both tech enthusiasts and IT professionals, offering a straightforward, step-by-step process to install Passbolt CE on your Ubuntu 22.04 system.

The post How to Install Passbolt on Ubuntu 22.04 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Install Passbolt on Ubuntu 22.04

description:
Linux hardware vendor TUXEDO Computers announced the availability for pre-order of the second generation (Gen2) TUXEDO Sirius 16 all-AMD Linux gaming laptop with an updated Ryzen 7 processor.

The post TUXEDO Sirius 16 Gen2 All-AMD Linux Gaming Laptop Gets Faster Ryzen 7 CPU appeared first on Linux Today.
title: TUXEDO Sirius 16 Gen2 All-AMD Linux Gaming Laptop Gets Faster Ryzen 7 CPU
